channel.title: How to change user id of the client?
channel.description: how the hells do i change the user id of a client? im getting a new client with my source and i dont member hot to change the user id?

item.title: How to change user id of the client?
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

You want your server to only accept connections from the official client. The UID is checked at the end of the login protocol. Instead of setting a custom static UID for the client, why not slightly modify the login protocol and send a few ‘handshake’ bytes back and forth for basic authentication at the beginning of the protocol.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change user id of the client?
